x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: The CDN URL Property for the Real Estate Dashboard and Real Estate Asset Management Applications are pointing to a Staging Server, instead of the Production Server, due to an Override Value contained in the Store Download used to install/upgrade the to the Sweden version of Nuvolo.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Incorrect Real Estate Properties
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: From the Real Estate Settings UI Page, revert real_estate_url to default.

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_76b28bb41b0f251088b2777e0a4bcbef
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>The CDN URL Property for the Real Estate Dashboard and Real Estate Asset Management Applications are pointing to a Staging Server, instead of the Production Server, due to an Override Value contained in the Store Download used to install/upgrade the to the Sweden version of Nuvolo.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Incorrect Real Estate Properties</name><order/><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>From the Real Estate Settings UI Page, revert real_estate_url to default.</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

gr_real = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_mobile_nuvolo_property');
gr_real.addQuery('name', 'real_estate_url');
gr_real.addQuery('is_override', true);
gr_real.query();
if (gr_real.next()) {
    if (gr_real.value.indexOf('nuvostaticstaging') > -1) {
        util.handleOutput('The real_estate_url nuvolo real estate property is overridden and pointing to the nuvostaticstaging URL please reset to default.', 'Error', 'Real Estate');
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>michael.peck@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-24 13:22:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>76b28bb41b0f251088b2777e0a4bcbef</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Incorrect Real Estate Properties</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_76b28bb41b0f251088b2777e0a4bcbef</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:26</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
